1370: Gloria moved to Die lange straet3.D.9 after marriage.
Got married to Herardus at age 22 in 1370.
1371: Gave birth to Ermegardis in 1371 at age 23.
1372: Gave birth to Assceric in 1372 at age 24.
1373: Gave birth to Laurens in 1373 at age 25.
Lost son Assceric when Assceric was 2 years old.
1374: Gave birth to Thitardo in 1374 at age 26.
1376: Gave birth to Leanne in 1376 at age 28.
Lost son Thitardo when Thitardo was 3 years old.
1378: Gave birth to Ermerut in 1378 at age 30.
1379: Gave birth to Wendelmodis in 1379 at age 31.
1380: Gave birth to Marie in 1380 at age 32.
1382: Lost daughter Leanne when Leanne was 7 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1383: Gave birth to Ebram in 1383 at age 35.
Lost son Ebram when Ebram was 1 years old.
1386: Gave birth to Sipper in 1386 at age 38.
Lost daughter Sipper when Sipper was 1 years old.
1389: Lost daughter Marie when Marie was 10 years old.
1392: Lost daughter Ermerut when Ermerut was 15 years old.
